alert.note: Alert for East Central Plains; Middle Rio Grande Valley; Northeast Highlands; Northeast Plains; Northwest Highlands; Sandia Manzano And Gallinas Mountains; West Central Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 18 at 3:24PM MDT until April 19 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING TUESDAY NOON TO 9 PM MDT FOR ALL AREAS EXCEPT CURRY AND ROOSEVELT COUNTIES DUE TO STRONG WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY, AND AN UNSTABLE ATMOSPHERE... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH WEDNESDAY MID MORNING UNTIL MID EVENING FOR ALL AREAS EXCEPT THE NORTHWEST PLATEAU AND NORTH CENTRAL MOUNTAINS DUE TO STRONG WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY, AND AN UNSTABLE ATMOSPHERE... .West and southwest winds will become strong Tuesday and to a lesser degree Wednesday, as relative humidity values plummet. Along with an unstable atmosphere and well above normal temperatures, this will lead to widespread critical fire weather conditions which are likely to return daily in many areas through the end of the week. In addition, widespread poor relative humidity recovery is expected Tuesday night. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 9 PM MDT TUESDAY... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * AREA AND TIMING...East Central Plains (except Curry and Roosevelt Counties) this afternoon until 9 PM this evening. All of the East Central Plains Wednesday from mid morning until mid evening. * 20 FOOT WINDS...For Tuesday, 20 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. For Wednesday, 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...For Tuesday, 10 to 15 percent. For Wednesday, 5 to 7 percent. Widespread poor humidity recovery Tuesday night (except in Curry and Roosevelt Counties). * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended..
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Fire Weather Watch.

area.areaDesc: East Central Plains; Middle Rio Grande Valley; Northeast Highlands; Northeast Plains; Northwest Highlands; Sandia Manzano And Gallinas Mountains; West Central Highlands
